eventParts.text: Are those birds waving at us?
Oh my beak, that’s my aunt and her husband!
Terry, is that you? You look so different!
It’s nice to meet you, ma’am.
Terry, what happened to you? Why aren’t you neutral? Does your parents know about this?
I’m… It’s okay, auntie Judy, I’ve just been traveling a bit lately. Don’t worry about it.
Terry! You’re not happy staying neutral at your parents’ farm? Are you angry at them?
No! No, auntie Judy, I’m just -
What went wrong, Terry, sweetfeathers? Is being neutral not good enough for you?

eventConsequence.selectionText: Hey, Terry can be any emotion he wants to be! There’s nothing wrong with other emotions.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah! I haven’t decided what emotion I’d like to be yet. Maybe I’ll be neutral and maybe I won’t be, but that’s my choice!

Terry gains +2 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: Well, maybe Terry is just trying out some other emotions at the moment, but he’ll go back to being neutral again when all this is over.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah, maybe. I haven’t decided what emotion I’d like to have yet.

Terry gains +2 caution!
